backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a domain-formatting fix, listing affected frontend files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to brief human‑written summaries of their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts, sets the title, and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating the 6‑step birthday flow, UI controls, overlays, and step rendering logic.
frontend/src/components/birthday/Birthda: Layout wrapper providing background visuals, looping music control, and footer for the birthday experience.
frontend/src/components/birthday/Celebra: Generates 30 randomly colored particle bursts for celebratory visual effects.
frontend/src/components/birthday/collect: Clickable hidden collectible that triggers SFX, animations, and state updates when found.
frontend/src/components/birthday/minigam: Displays temporary floating inspirational quotes at balloon pop locations with motion‑sensitive animation behavior.
Provides a list of inspirational quotes and a helper that returns a non‑repeating random quote.
frontend/src/components/birthday/modals/: Modal that animates a gift box revealing a handwritten birthday note, allowing the user to view, edit, and download their memory capsule message.
Balloon‑popping minigame modal that tracks popped balloons, shows quotes, awards achievements, and signals completion when all balloons are popped.
frontend/src/components/birthday/notific: Provides a global toast notification layer using the Sonner Toaster component.
frontend/src/components/birthday/Progres: Renders a multi‑step progress bar showing current and completed steps.
frontend/src/components/birthday/Sparkle: Creates a pointer‑tracking sparkle trail effect with throttling and automatic fade‑out.
frontend/src/components/birthday/steps/S: Step component that introduces and opens the BirthdayNoteModal for viewing the birthday message.
Step where the user reveals a bouquet image, triggering an achievement and offering a continue button.
Interactive step letting users blow out cake candles, updating state per candle and awarding an achievement when all are extinguished.
Step where opening a gift box triggers sound, achievements, and a burst of animated smiley icons before continuing.
Wraps the balloon‑popping minigame modal and advances the flow once the user wins and continues.
Birthday flow step that collects the user's age, validates it, triggers celebration UI, and advances the step.
frontend/src/components/birthday/steps/W: Renders animated decorative background elements for the birthday wish screen.
frontend/src/features/achievements/achie: Defines achievement types, a static achievements list, and a helper to retrieve an achievement by id.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBirthdayFlow.ts: Zustand store managing birthday flow state including steps, age, audio settings, collectibles, and achievements.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that returns whether the user prefers reduced motion based on a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useSfx.ts: Hook for playing cached sound effects respecting mute and armed settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining theme variables, celebration colors, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentSlug.ts: Provides validation, sanitization, and fallback generation for deployment slugs enforcing length and character rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, theme extensions, custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, architecture notes, issues, and the birthday‑experience flow description.
